```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\s*\([A-Z][a-z,A-Z]*\)\s*\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\s*shall\s*[A-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities

# Test the function
print(extract_entities('Tactical Control System (TCS) System/Subsystem Specification'))
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(VLA Expansion Project Correlator Monitor and Control System|the VLA Expansion Project Correlator Monitor and Control System)\b'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group())
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(patient|sun|old|tap|hard disk|database|magnetic stripe card)\b'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group())
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(patient|sun|old)\b'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group())
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk)\b'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group())
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(requirement|requirements|aim|purpose|system to be developed)\b'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group())
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(events|states|values|connected entities)\b'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group())
    
    return entities
```

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],

```python
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bthe\s\w+\sSystem\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b\w+\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\bthe\s\w+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches
    
    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+-\d+\b|\b[A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b|\b[A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b|\b[a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b|\b[A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ to be developed\b|\b[A-Z][a-z]+ shall\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ communications\b|\b[A-Z][a-z]+ data\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b(Software|System)\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b(Device|UAVs|UAV|Vehicle|Aerial|Control|System)\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b(Object|Team|Office|Project|Mission|Goals|Objectives|Team|Office|Project|Mission|Goals|Objectives)\b',
        'External System': r'\b(System|Database|Card|Disk|Stripe|Tap|Card|Disk|Stripe|Tap)\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b(Goals|Objectives|Mission|Requirements|Objectives|Mission|Requirements)\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b(Data|Information|Events|States|Values|Data|Information|Events|States|Values)\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(Correlator|Tactical|VLA)\s+(Monitor|Control|System)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[2] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(VLA|Correlator|Tactical)\s+(Expansion|Monitor|Control)\s+(Project|Structure)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[3] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(VLA|Correlator|Tactical)\s+(Expansion|Monitor|Control)\s+(Project|Structure)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[3] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(VLA|Correlator|Tactical)\s+(Expansion|Monitor|Control)\s+(Project|Structure)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[3] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(Design|Development|Conduct)\s+(of|in)\s+(two)\s+(phases)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[0] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(Shared|Set)\s+(of)\s+(events|states|values)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[2] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ device)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ object)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'requirements'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ phenomena)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches
    
    return entities
```

```python
def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Device\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Object\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'System Requirements': r'require|shall|aim|purpose|to be developed',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ data|message|event|state|value'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result
```

```python
def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {'Software System': [], 'Physical Device': [], 'Environment Object': [], 'External System': [], 'System Requirements': [], 'Shared Phenomena': []}

    software_systems = re.findall(r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b\w+\sUAV\b', sentence)
    physical_devices += re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\sInterface\b', sentence)
    external_systems += re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'the\s*(\w+)\s*shall'
    match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Software System'].append(match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'a\s*(\w+),\s*including'
    match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'a\s*(\w+)'
    match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'a\s*(\w+),\s*a\s*(\w+)'
    match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['External System'].append(match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'To\s*(\w+)\s*in\s*other\s*centers'
    match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(\w+),\s*(\w+),\s*(\w+),\s*(\w+),\s*(\w+)'
    match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].extend(match.groups())

    return entities
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\bthe\s\w+\ssoftware\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b\w+\sUAVs\b|\b\w+\sUAV\s\w+\b|\b\w+\sUAV\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b\w+\soperator\b|\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena
    
    return json.dumps(entities)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|the)\s+(Tactical|tactical)\s+(Control|control)\s+(System|system)\b'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(0))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(computers|Computers|COMPUTERS)\b'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(0))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(open|Open|OPEN)\s+(architecture|Architecture|ARCHITECTURE)\b'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(0))
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(using|Using|USING)\s+(Service|service|SERVICE)\b'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(0))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(Tactical|tactical)\s+(Control|control)\s+(System|system)\b'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(0))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(capable|Capable|CAPABLE)\b'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(equipment|Equipment|EQUIPMENT)\s+(requests|Requests|REQUESTS)\b'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(0))

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"The\s([A-Za-z\s]+)\sSystem"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1).strip())
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"the\s([A-Za-z\s]+)\shardware"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1).strip())
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1).strip())
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"the\s([A-Za-z\s]+)\sProject\sMonitor\sand\sControl\sSystem"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1).strip())
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\sbe\scapable\sof\s([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1).strip())
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\sconfiguration"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1).strip())
    
    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    return result
```

```python
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ device)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(shall have|shall be|will be|must be|should be|can be) ([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[1] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ and [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
    schema = {
```

```python
        'External System': r'\b\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    return result
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|NISN|local SwRI archive|public view)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|these interfaces|the ASPERA-3 team|PDS)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|IDFS data sets|the ASPERA-3 IDFS data sets)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|the IDFS data sets)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|the telemetry data|the data|current data|the telemetry)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|A)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(System|System\s*)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(unit|system|processor|module|device|controller|interface|system|system\s*)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[0])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(the|a|an)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[2])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(interface|system|module|device|controller|system|system\s*)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[0])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|will|must|should|can|may|is|are|am|be|been|being)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[2])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(through|via|with|by|using|via|via\s*)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[2])

    return entities

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The Tactical Control System will be connected with Joint Surveillance Target Attack Radar System (JSTARS) Ground Station Module/Common"))
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(?:the)?\s*(\w+)\s+system\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    for match in software_systems:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1].capitalize())

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(?:the)?\s*(\w+)\s+device\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    for match in physical_devices:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[1].capitalize())

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(?:the)?\s*(\w+)\s+(?:object|entity)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    for match in environment_objects:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[1].capitalize())

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(?:the)?\s*(\w+)\s+system\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    for match in external_systems:
        entities['External System'].append(match[1].capitalize())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(?:the)?\s*(\w+)\s+requirement(s)?\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    for match in system_requirements:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[1].capitalize())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(?:the)?\s*(\w+)\s+phenomenon(s)?\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    for match in shared_phenomena:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[1].capitalize())

    return entities
```

```python
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',

    # Initialize the result dictionary

        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
```

```python
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'receive|process|transfer|display|monitor|get|send|receive|store|update|delete',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'tasking orders|operational information|dynamic control data|status and error messages|monitor data'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    return result
``` 

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],

        'Environment Object': [],

```python
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b\w+\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b\w+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+\b'
```

```python
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ (?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )*\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ (?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )*\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ (?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )*\b'
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for system in software_systems:
        if system not in entities['Software System']:
            entities['Software System'].append(system)
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for device in physical_devices:
        if device not in entities['Physical Device']:
            entities['Physical Device'].append(device)
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for obj in environment_objects:
        if obj not in entities['Environment Object']:
            entities['Environment Object'].append(obj)
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for system in external_systems:
        if system not in entities['External System']:
            entities['External System'].append(system)
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for requirement in system_requirements:
        if requirement not in entities['System Requirements']:
            entities['System Requirements'].append(requirement)
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for phenomenon in shared_phenomena:
        if phenomenon not in entities['Shared Phenomena']:
            entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(phenomenon)
    
    return entities
```

```python
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)

    return entities
```

```python
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\bthe\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\bsoftware\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\brequirement\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\blevel\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities
```

```python
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result
```

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
```python
        'Software System': r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result
```

```python
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [a-z]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [a-z]+ system network)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ states)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena

    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\bThe\s+system\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b(a|an)\s+(power|tactical|control)\s+(switch|system)\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [f"{item[1]} {item[2]}" for item in physical_device]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b(the|current)\s+operational\s+environment\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b(an)\s+(appliance)\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [f"{item[1]}"] for item in external_system]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(the|startup)\s+state\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(the|current)\s+state\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bthis\b|\bthe system\b|\bthe software\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\bhardware devices\b|\bCPU\b|\bdevice\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\bstate\b|\bmode\b|\bcondition\b',
        'External System': r'\bdatabase\b|\bcard\b|\bhard disk\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\brecovery\b|\bautonomous\b|\bminimal\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\bshared\b|\bevents\b|\bvalues\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
        # Add matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[a-z]*\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[a-z]*\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z]*\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ and [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ Device\b'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ System\b'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'shall|must|need|require'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(sentence)

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ Phenomena\b'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group())

    return entities
```

```python
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b\w+\b'

    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System

    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b|shall|must|should|can|will'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ subsystem\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ device\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\bthe [a-z]+ environment\b|\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [a-z]+'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ database\b|\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ card\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ functionality\b|\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ setting\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ state\b|\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ time\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

    }

```python
    # Loop through each entity type

        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    import json
    return json.dumps(result)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bthis\b|\bthe\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\bhardware\b|\bdevice\b',
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': r'\bstartup\b|\bdownload\b|\bestablishment\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # If the pattern is a list, use a regular expression to match any of the items in the list
        if isinstance(pattern, list):
            pattern = r'\b(' + r'\b|\b'.join(pattern) + r'\b'
        # If the pattern is a string, use it as is
        else:
            pattern = pattern

        # Use regular expression to find all matches in the sentence
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)

        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    return result
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in software_systems:
        if word.isupper():
            entities['Software System'].append(word)
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in physical_devices:
        if word.islower() and word not in entities['Software System']:
            entities['Physical Device'].append(word)
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in environment_objects:
        if word.islower() and word not in entities['Software System'] and word not in entities['Physical Device']:
            entities['Environment Object'].append(word)
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in external_systems:
        if word.islower() and word not in entities['Software System'] and word not in entities['Physical Device'] and word not in entities['Environment Object']:
            entities['External System'].append(word)
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in system_requirements:
        if word.islower() and word not in entities['Software System'] and word not in entities['Physical Device'] and word not in entities['Environment Object'] and word not in entities['External System']:
            entities['System Requirements'].append(word)
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in shared_phenomena:
        if word.islower() and word not in entities['Software System'] and word not in entities['Physical Device'] and word not in entities['Environment Object'] and word not in entities['External System'] and word not in entities['System Requirements']:
            entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(word)
    
    return entities
```

```python
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sdevice\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\sobject\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\ssystem\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\srequirement\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\sphenomena\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json
```

```python
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    return result
```

```python
    if physical_device_matches:

    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'] = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(Database|Card|Disk|Stripe|Tap|System)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_matches:
        external_system_matches = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
        entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(Requirement|Purpose|Aim|Goal|System)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'] = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(Event|State|Value|Signals|Phenomena|Shared)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_matches:

    return entities
``` 

```python
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',

        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'to\s+protect\s+the\s+[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result
``` 

```python
import json

    entity_types = {

    }

    # Initialize the extracted entities dictionary
    extracted_entities = {entity_type: [] for entity_type in entity_types.keys()}

    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # Iterate over the entity types
    for entity_type, regex in entity_types.items():
        # Find all matches for the current entity type
        matches = re.findall(regex, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the extracted entities dictionary
        extracted_entities[entity_type] = matches

    # Return the extracted entities as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(extracted_entities)
```

```python
def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Device\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Object\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'System Requirements': r'require|shall|must|should|can|need|be able to|have the ability to|support|accept|perform|recover|monitor|take corrective action|autonomously|recover from|hardware and computing system faults|software upgrades',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'shared|events|states|values|between|connected|entities'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(Tactical Control System|System)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(power|CPU|device)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(user|patient|sun|old)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|card|tap|disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(minimal|planned|default|normal|autonomously)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(state|power|time|period|service|reboot|reconfigure|return|damage|operations|restart|condition|impact)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches
    
    return entities

# Test the function
sentence = "Upon the selection of a shutdown command the Tactical Control System shall enter the Shutdown State, which will cause the Tactical Control System to be placed in a condition where power can be removed without impacting operations as well as causing damage to the system, and from which restart of the system can be accomplished normally."
print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ device\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [a-z]+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ to be designed\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ requests\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"The\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*(have|receive|translate|process)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(from|in)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(will|can|be)\s*received|(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(will|can|be)\s*translated|(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(will|can|be)\s*processed"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(will|can|be)\s*received|(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(will|can|be)\s*translated|(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(will|can|be)\s*processed"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(will|can|be)\s*received|(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(will|can|be)\s*translated|(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(will|can|be)\s*processed"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|will|can)\s*(have|receive|translate|process)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(3))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|will|can)\s*(have|receive|translate|process)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(3))
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|receive|translate|process)\s+the\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+System"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(3))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"shall\s+(receive|translate|process)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+from\s+the\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+system"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(3))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|receive|translate|process)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+from\s+the\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(3))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|receive|translate|process)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+from\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+system"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(3))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|receive|translate|process)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(2))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|receive|translate|process)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(2))

    return entities

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(Tactical|Remote|Correlator|Graphical|User|Interface|System|Monitor|Control)\s+(GUI|Interface|Software|Monitor|Control)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] + ' ' + match[2] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s+(pointing|device|card|tap|hard|disk)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(patient|sun|old)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s+(database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard|disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(full|keyset|redundancy)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(shared|events|states|values|between|connected|entities)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sdevice\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\sobject\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\ssystem\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\srequirement\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\sphenomena\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    return result
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+ device\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+ object\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+ system\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+ to [A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+ for [A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+ and [A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(Tactical|Correlator|EVLA|EVLA Correlator|Control|Monitor|System)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(power|computer|watchdog|timer|switch|device|card|tap|hard disk|stripe)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(user|patient|sun|old)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(shall|allow|have|be)\s+(set|reboot|configured|configured to)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[0] + ' ' + match[1] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(state|time|period|event|value|values|events|states)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[1] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities
```

```python
def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bthe\s\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sdevice\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\sobject\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\ssystem\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\bshall\sbe\sable\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\sidentifier\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(Tactical|Correlator|VCI|LCS|User|Interface|System)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1])
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(map|VCI|LCS|tap|hard disk|magnetic stripe card|Correlator Monitor and Control System|graphical user interface)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[1])
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(map|patient|sun|old|LCS)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[1])
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|Correlator Monitor and Control System)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[1])
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(display|access|configure|provide|capable|allow|remotely|graphically)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match)
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(displaying|accessing|configuring|providing|capable|allowing|remotely|graphically)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match)
    
    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|an|a)\s+(APA|Data|System|Software)\s+(system|data|system|software)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[3] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(validated|6)\s+degree-of-freedom\s+air\s+vehicle\s+simulator\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(users|operators)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard|disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(all|flight|planning|calculations)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(when|compared|with|a|mission|flown|by)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(Tactical|Center|System)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(device|beacon|tap|hard disk|database|magnetic stripe card)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(patient|sun|old|fire support coordination zones|airspace control zones|threat systems|radar terrain|HAR|DMS|Center|user)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(to|shall|support|provide|be able to)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(icons|threat engagement envelopes|network identifier|HAR identifier|username|password|message|Target DMS|Message to be displayed|Beacons On/Off|device control command|displaying overlays|airspace control zones|threat systems|fire support coordination zones|radar terrain masking|associated radar terrain)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\b\s*shall\s*\w+\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b\w+\b\s*control\s*\w+\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b\w+\b\s*in\s*\w+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\b\s*identifier\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+\b\s*shall\s*\w+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+\b\s*data\s*\w+\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```
