import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in software_systems:
        if word.lower() in ['system', 'software']:
            entities['Software System'].append(word)

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in physical_devices:
        if word.lower() in ['display', 'device', 'screen']:
            entities['Physical Device'].append(word)

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in environment_objects:
        if word.lower() in ['map', 'world', 'patient', 'sun', 'old']:
            entities['Environment Object'].append(word)

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in external_systems:
        if word.lower() in ['database', 'card', 'disk']:
            entities['External System'].append(word)

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in system_requirements:
        if word.lower() in ['load', 'zoom', 'scroll', 'print', 'clear']:
            entities['System Requirements'].append(word)

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in shared_phenomena:
        if word.lower() in ['displaying', 'following']:
            entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(word)

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(A|an|the)\s+(Center|System)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(Traffic|DMS|AV)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(user|patient|sun|old|desired|Center|System)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard|disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(display|receive|provide|select|be able to)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(Target|Message|Beacons|payload|center|field|of|view|footprint|downlink|Plan)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

    for key, pattern in schema.items():

        # Add the matches to the result dictionary

        'External System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\sSystem\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\srequirement\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"The\s([A-Za-z\s]+)\sSystem"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\sControl\sComputer"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1).strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1).strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"the\s([A-Za-z\s]+)\sExpansion\sProject\sMonitor\sand\sControl\sSystem"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\sbe\sable\s\sto\s([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1).strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\sinformation"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1).strip())

    return entities

    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ AV\b',
        'Environment Object': [],

        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ functionality\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\bBLOS\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # If the pattern is not empty, search for it in the sentence
        if pattern:
            matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
            result[key] = matches

    return result

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b(Tactical|Control|System)\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b(contact|sensor|system|performance|parameters|limits|operator|AV)\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b(operator|AV|performance|parameters|limits)\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b(System|operator|AV|performance|parameters|limits)\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(notify|out|of|limits)\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(out|of|limits)\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities

# Test the function

        'Software System': r'\b\w+\sSystem\b',

        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\sobject\b',

        'System Requirements': r'\bshall\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\sidentifier\b|\b\w+\smessage\b|\b\w+\scommand\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result

        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    software_system_pattern = r'\bthe\s\w+\sSystem\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\bthe\s\w+\sAV\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b\w+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\sdatabase\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Device\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Object\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Requirements\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Phenomena\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result

    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+ database\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+ to [A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+ behaviors\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b(UAV|Device)\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b(operator|user|patient|sun|old)\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b(software|tools|database|card|disk)\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(configure|change|override|initiate|control|send|receive|start|stop)\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(configuration|navigation|methods|commands|level|command|line|instruction)\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema definition
    schema = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Define the regular expressions for each entity type
    software_system_regex = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b'
    physical_device_regex = r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]*\b|the [a-z]+'
    environment_object_regex = r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]*\b|the [a-z]+'
    external_system_regex = r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]*\b|the [a-z]+'
    system_requirements_regex = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b'
    shared_phenomena_regex = r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]*\b|the [a-z]+'

    # Extract entities using regular expressions
    software_systems = re.findall(software_system_regex, sentence)
    physical_devices = re.findall(physical_device_regex, sentence)
    environment_objects = re.findall(environment_object_regex, sentence)
    external_systems = re.findall(external_system_regex, sentence)
    system_requirements = re.findall(system_requirements_regex, sentence)
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(shared_phenomena_regex, sentence)

    # Update the schema with the extracted entities

    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bthe\s\w+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sdevice\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'To\s\w+\scontrol\s\w+',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': [],

        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    physical_device_regex = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b|the\s\w+'
    environment_object_regex = r'\b\w+\b'
    external_system_regex = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b|the\s\w+'
    system_requirements_regex = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b|recovery\sfrom\s\w+'
    shared_phenomena_regex = r'\b\w+\b|OPEN|CLOSED'

    # Find all matches for each entity type
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_regex, sentence)
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_regex, sentence)
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_regex, sentence)
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_regex, sentence)
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_regex, sentence)
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_regex, sentence)

    # Add the matches to the schema
    schema['Software System'] = software_system_matches
    schema['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches
    schema['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches
    schema['External System'] = external_system_matches
    schema['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches
    schema['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return schema

# Test the function

def extract_entities(sentence):

    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\bthe [a-z]+|a [a-z]+|the [a-z]+s\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\bthe [a-z]+|an [a-z]+|the [a-z]+s\b',
        'External System': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+|a [a-z]+|the [a-z]+s\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ to [A-Z][a-z]+|to [A-Z][a-z]+|for [A-Z][a-z]+|to [A-Z][a-z]+ for [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+|a [a-z]+|the [a-z]+s\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

        # Add the matches to the result dictionary

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b\w+\sdevice\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

# Test the function

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema definition
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b(Space Fractions|the Space Fractions)\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b(hot swappable devices|components)\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b(the user|the designated Recovery site|the old|the patient|the sun)\b',
        'External System': r'\b(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk)\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b(Maximal practical use|minimum amount of fuel)\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b(score|results|fuel)\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema definition
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The user's score must be kept as local data within the Space Fractions system so that the results may be given at the end of the Space Fractions system."))
print(extract_entities("Maximal practical use of available hot swappable devices and components shall be made."))
print(extract_entities("Bingo fuel is the minimum amount of fuel necessary to return to the designated Recovery site with reserve fuel."))
```

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"The\s([A-Za-z\s]+)\sSystem"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\sExpansion"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1).strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1).strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\sExpansion"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1).strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\sposition"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1).strip())

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Device\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Object\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'System Requirements': r'requirements|aim|purpose|shall|transfer|monitor|process',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'status|error|messages|inputs|data'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    return result

The function loops through each entity type in the schema, uses the regular expression to find all matches in the sentence, and adds the matches to the result dictionary. The function returns the result dictionary.

The regular expressions used in the schema definition are:
- `Software System`: `\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b` matches any string that starts with a capital letter, followed by one or more lowercase letters, a space, another capital letter, one or more lowercase letters, and ends with the word "System".
- `Physical Device`: `\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Device\b` matches any string that starts with a capital letter, followed by one or more lowercase letters, a space, another capital letter, one or more lowercase letters, and ends with the word "Device".
- `Environment Object`: `\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Object\b` matches any string that starts with a capital letter, followed by one or more lowercase letters, a space, another capital letter, one or more lowercase letters, and ends with the word "Object".
- `External System`: `\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b` matches any string that starts with a capital letter, followed by one or more lowercase letters, a space, another capital letter, one or more lowercase letters, and ends with the word "System".
- `System Requirements`: `requirements|aim|purpose|shall|transfer|monitor|process` matches any of the words "requirements", "aim", "purpose", "shall", "transfer", "monitor", or "process".
- `Shared Phenomena`: `status|error|messages|inputs|data` matches any of the words "status", "error", "messages", "inputs", or "data".

The regular expressions are case-insensitive, so they will match strings regardless of the case of the letters. The `\b` at the start and end of each pattern is a word boundary, which ensures that the pattern matches a whole word, not part of another word. The `[A-Z][a-z]+` matches one or more capital letters followed by one or more lowercase letters. The `+` after the `[a-z]+` matches one or more occurrences of the preceding pattern. The `|` in the `System Requirements` and `Shared Phenomena` patterns is a logical OR operator, which matches any of the words on either side of the `|`. The `re.IGNORECASE` flag makes the regular expression matching case-insensitive. The `re.findall` function returns all non-overlapping matches of the pattern in the string as a list of strings. import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'the\s+(?:Center|System|Tactical Control System|DMS|Traffic Signal|AV)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'a\s+(?:data terminal|DMS|Traffic Signal|AV)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'the\s+(?:sun|old|patient)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'a\s+(?:database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|DMS)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'To\s+support\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+control\s+in\s+other\s+centers'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(?:data link terminal commands|data link|device control command|network identifier|traffic signal identifier|username|password|traffic signal plan identifier)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema definition
    schema = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Define the regular expressions for each entity type
    software_system_regex = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    physical_device_regex = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ device\b'
    environment_object_regex = r'\b[a-z]+ (patient|sun|old)\b'
    external_system_regex = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ (database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk)\b'
    system_requirements_regex = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ (transfer|monitor|select|process)\b'
    shared_phenomena_regex = r'\b[a-z]+ (data|information|event|state|value)\b'

    # Extract entities using regular expressions
    if re.search(software_system_regex, sentence):
        schema['Software System'] = re.findall(software_system_regex, sentence)
    if re.search(physical_device_regex, sentence):
        schema['Physical Device'] = re.findall(physical_device_regex, sentence)
    if re.search(environment_object_regex, sentence):
        schema['Environment Object'] = re.findall(environment_object_regex, sentence)
    if re.search(external_system_regex, sentence):
        schema['External System'] = re.findall(external_system_regex, sentence)
    if re.search(system_requirements_regex, sentence):
        schema['System Requirements'] = re.findall(system_requirements_regex, sentence)
    if re.search(shared_phenomena_regex, sentence):
        schema['Shared Phenomena'] = re.findall(shared_phenomena_regex, sentence)

    return str(schema)

    # Initialize the result dictionary

    # Loop through each entity type

        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

    }

    entities['Software System'] = software_systems
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\sdevice\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\sobject\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\ssystem\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\srequirement\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\sphenomena\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+-\d+|\w+\s\w+)(\(.*?\))'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+-\d+|\w+\s\w+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+-\d+|\w+\s\w+)(\(.*?\))'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+-\d+|\w+\s\w+)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+-\d+|\w+\s\w+)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

        'Environment Object': r'\b(ASPERA-3 Co-I|the ASPERA-3 team|the sun|the old|the patient)\b',
        'External System': r'\b(Tactical Control System|database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|Orbit/Attitude)\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b(meeting MEX mission goals and objectives|support the ASPERA-3 team in meeting MEX mission goals and objectives)\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b(ASPERA-3 IDFS data|ASPERA-3 telemetry|digital and analog imagery|associated telemetry)\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return str(result)

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ to [A-Z][a-z]+ infrastructure|This [A-Z][a-z]+ to [A-Z][a-z]+ infrastructure)'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'(traffic|device|data|information|control)'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'(external auditors|TMCs|patient|sun|old)'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'(External storage|database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk)'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(to examine or analyse system activity|to exchange device control information between TMCs)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(traffic data|device control information)'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group())

    return entities

# Test the function

    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(NISN|Archive|View|System|Card|Disk|Tap|Card|System|System|System)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(Team|Patient|Sun|Old|System|System|System)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(Database|Card|Disk|Tap|Card|System|System|System)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(Necessary|Support|Data|Information|Requirements|System|System|System)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[1] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(Telemetry|Data|Information|Message|Set|Files|System|System|System)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[1] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities

    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(A|an|the)\s+(Tactical|Control|System)\b'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(0))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(cross\s+hairs|ICON)\b'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(0))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(target)\b'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(0))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(database|magnetic\s+stripe\s+card|tap|hard\s+disk)\b'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(0))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(have|have|have)\s+the\s+capability\s+to\s+(select|deselect)\s+several\s+types\s+of\s+(cross\s+hairs|ICON)\s+to\s+identify\s+a\s+selected\s+point\s+on\s+a\s+target\b'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(Target|Plan)\b'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(0))

    return entities

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Define the regular expressions for each entity type
    software_system_regex = r'\b(software|system)\b'
    physical_device_regex = r'\b(device|machine|computer|equipment)\b'
    environment_object_regex = r'\b(patient|sun|old|team|data|analysis|goals|objectives|image|video|image enhancement|capability|contrast|brightness|edge enhancement|sharpness)\b'
    external_system_regex = r'\b(database|card|disk|stripe|tap|hard disk|ASPERA-3|ASP|ER|A-3|team|data|analysis|goals|objectives|image|video|image enhancement|capability|contrast|brightness|edge enhancement|sharpness)\b'
    system_requirements_regex = r'\b(meeting|mission|goals|objectives|contrast|brightness|edge enhancement|sharpness)\b'
    shared_phenomena_regex = r'\b(graphical|images|video|alternative|equivalent|textual|text-based|functionality|data|analysis|goals|objectives|image|video|image enhancement|capability|contrast|brightness|edge enhancement|sharpness)\b'

    # Find all matches for each entity type
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_regex, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_regex, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_regex, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_regex, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_regex, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_regex, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)

    # Add the matches to the schema
    schema['Software System'] = software_system_matches
    schema['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches
    schema['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches
    schema['External System'] = external_system_matches
    schema['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches
    schema['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    # Return the schema as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(schema)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The image enhancement capability shall include contrast, brightness, edge enhancement, and sharpness."))

    # Environment Object

    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object

    # External System

    # System Requirements

    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(Center|System)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(Traffic Signal|DMS|Beacons|Tap|hard disk)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a)\s+(user|operator|patient|sun|old|payload field-of-view center)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(database|magnetic stripe card|hard disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(target location function|aim|purpose|system to be developed)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[1] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(Target Traffic Signal and Plan|Target DMS|Message to be displayed|Beacons On/Off|ground location|current location|field-of-view center)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b\w+\sdevice\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b\w+\sobject\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\sSystem\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+\sshall\s\w+\s'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sDevice\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\sObject\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\sSystem\b',
        'System Requirements': r'requirements|aim|purpose|to be developed',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\sdata|information|message|event|state|value'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

# Test the function

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|the)\s+(Tactical|tactical)\s+(Control|control)\s+(System|system)\b'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(0))
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(Master|master)\s+(Correlator|correlator)\s+(Control|control)\s+(Computer|computer)\b'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(0))
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(VCI|vci)\b'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(0))
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(Correlator|correlator)\s+(Monitor|monitor)\s+(and|and)\s+(Control|control)\s+(System|system)\b'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(0))
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(manage|Manage)\s+(all|All)\s+(operational|Operational)\s+(C4I|c4i)\s+(interfaces|Interfaces)\s+across\s+(all|All)\s+(5|five)\s+(levels|Levels)\s+of\s+(interaction|Interaction)\b'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(the|The)\s+(core|Core)\s+(services|Services)\s+,?\s+(support|Support)\s+layer\s+and\s+(security|Security)\s+and\s+(access|Access)\s+control\s+components\s+can\s+be\s+deployed\s+as\s+standard\s+components\s+with\s+necessary\s+configuration\s+changes\b'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(0))
    
    return entities

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The Tactical Control System will have the capability to manage all operational C4I interfaces across all 5 levels of interaction."))
```

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\bthe [a-z]+ [a-z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\bthe [a-z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ to [a-z]+ [a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ path\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

The schema is defined as a dictionary where the keys are the entity types and the values are the regular expression patterns to match the entities. The function iterates over the schema, uses the `re.findall` function to find the matches, and adds the matches to the result dictionary. Finally, the function returns the result as a JSON string using the `json.dumps` function. The code also includes a test case to demonstrate the function's usage.

    for ent in doc.ents:

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b\w+\sdevice\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

# Test the function

        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ signals\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema definition
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find the entities
        if pattern:
            entities = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
            result[key] = entities
        else:
            result[key] = []

    return result

    }

The function uses regular expressions to match the entities against the schema definition. The regular expressions are defined in the `schema` dictionary, where each key is an entity type and the value is a regular expression pattern. The function loops through each entity type in the schema, uses the regular expression to find all matches in the sentence, and adds the matches to the result dictionary. The function returns the result dictionary.

The regular expressions used in the code are:
- `r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b'` matches the entity type "Software System" or "External System", which consists of three words starting with a capital letter, followed by one or more lowercase letters, and ends with the word "System".

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(CCTNS|DigitalHome|Tactical Control System|system)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(user|patient|sun|old|tap|hard disk|magnetic stripe card|device)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bthe\s\system\b'
    if re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Software System'].append('the system')

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+[a-z]*\b'
    physical_devices = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+[a-z]*\b'
    environment_objects = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+[a-z]*\b'
    external_systems = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+[a-z]*\b'
    system_requirements = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+[a-z]*\b'
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s\w+\sSystem)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s\w+\sdevice)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s\w+)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s\w+\sSystem)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(\w+\s\w+\s\w+)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s\w+)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b(Tactical|Digital|System)\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b(workstation|card|disk|tap|stripe|system)\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b(patient|sun|old|technician|user)\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b(database|magnetic|hard|stripe|card|tap)\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(startup|setting|making|establishing|providing|continue|control|monitoring|correlator|power|failure|network|operation|stopping|starting)\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(configuration|event|state|value|message|data|information)\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities

    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

        'Shared Phenomena': r'\bwireless signals\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary

    # Iterate over the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():

        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)

        result[key] = matches

    return result

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9\s]+[A-Za-z0-9\s]*[A-Za-z])\s*shall\s*(.*)'
    match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Software System'].append(match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9\s]+[A-Za-z0-9\s]*[A-Za-z])\s*(shall|can|is)\s*(be|have|get|send|receive)\s*(data|information)'
    match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9\s]+[A-Za-z0-9\s]*[A-Za-z])\s*(shall|can|is)\s*(not|be|have|get|send|receive)\s*(data|information)\s*(from|to)\s*([A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9\s]+[A-Za-z0-9\s]*[A-Za-z])'
    match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9\s]+[A-Za-z0-9\s]*[A-Za-z])\s*(shall|can|is)\s*(be|have|get|send|receive)\s*(data|information)\s*(from|to)\s*([A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9\s]+[A-Za-z0-9\s]*[A-Za-z])'
    match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['External System'].append(match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(shall|can|is)\s*(be|have|get|send|receive)\s*(data|information)\s*(from|to)\s*([A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9\s]+[A-Za-z0-9\s]*[A-Za-z])'
    match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9\s]+[A-Za-z0-9\s]*[A-Za-z])\s*(shall|can|is)\s*(be|have|get|send|receive)\s*(data|information)\s*(from|to)\s*([A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9\s]+[A-Za-z0-9\s]*[A-Za-z])'
    match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match.group(0))

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b(Software|System)\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b(Device|Equipment|Hardware)\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b(Object|Entity|Thing)\b',
        'External System': r'\b(System|Database|Card|Disk)\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b(require|need|shall|must|can|may|should)\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b(event|state|value|status)\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    return result

        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|the)\s+(Tactical|tactical)\s+(Control|control)\s+(System|system)\b'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(0))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(hardware|Hardware)\s+(and|And)\s+(software|Software)\s+(functionality|Functionality)\b'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(0))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(Service|service)\s+(Mission|mission)\s+(Planners|planners)\b'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(0))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(Service|service)\s+(Mission|mission)\s+(Planners|planners)\b'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(0))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(necessary|Necessary)\s+(hardware|Hardware)\s+(and|And)\s+(software|Software)\s+(functionality|Functionality)\b'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(integrate|Integrate)\b'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(0))

    return entities

# Test the function

print(extract_entities(sentence))

    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Process the sentence using spaCy
    doc = nlp(sentence)
    
    # Extract the entities
    for ent in doc.ents:
        if ent.label_ == "ORG":
            entities['Software System'].append(ent.text)
        elif ent.label_ == "GPE":
            entities['Physical Device'].append(ent.text)
        elif ent.label_ == "PERSON":
            entities['Environment Object'].append(ent.text)
        elif ent.label_ == "ORG":
            entities['External System'].append(ent.text)
        elif ent.label_ == "NORP":
            entities['System Requirements'].append(ent.text)
        elif ent.label_ == "EVENT":
            entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(ent.text)
    
    return entities

# Test the function

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(the|a|an)?\s*(\w+)\s+system\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[2])
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(the|a|an)?\s*(\w+)\s+device\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[2])
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(the|a|an)?\s*(\w+)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[2])
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(the|a|an)?\s*(\w+)\s+system\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[2])
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(the|a|an)?\s*(\w+)\s+requirement(s)?\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[2])
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(the|a|an)?\s*(\w+)\s+phenomenon(s)?\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[2])
    
    return entities

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The Tactical Control System shall provide the necessary hardware and software functionality to allow the Tactical Control System to integrate with MIES."))
```

    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)

    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)

    # System Requirements

        'System Requirements': r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():

    }

    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',

        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ device)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ sites)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ requirements)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ information)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

# Test the function

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ device\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ object\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ system\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ to be developed\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena

import re

    # Environment Object

    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'existing systems'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'to ensure interoperability'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'addition|provide'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|the|A|a)\s*(\w+)\s*(System|system)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(A|a)\s*(\w+)\s*(device|Device)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[1])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(A|a)\s*(\w+)\s*(object|Object)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[1])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(A|a)\s*(\w+)\s*(system|System)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[1])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(System|system)\s*(requirements|Requirements)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[0])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(shared|Shared)\s*(phenomena|Phenomena)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[0])

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(Tactical|Monitor|Control|System)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(Monitor|Control)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(interface|interfaces)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(existing|system)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(shall|provide)\s+(an internal interface for the SAR Processor)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[0] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(SAR information|imagery and telemetry)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[0] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities
