```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(ASPERA-3|MEX OA|SwRI archive|APAF|system)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(Video Cassette Recorder|VCR|tap|hard disk|database|magnetic stripe card|local SwRI archive)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(analog imagery and overlays|intermediate files|ASPERA-3 and MEX OA cleaned-up telemetry|the patient|the sun|the old|a local SwRI archive|the ASPERA-3 team|APAF)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|Video Cassette Recorder|VCR|local SwRI archive)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(data availability and re-processing|recording and playback)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(intermediate files|ASPERA-3 and MEX OA cleaned-up telemetry|analog imagery and overlays|The ASPERA-3 and MEX OA telemetry data)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
``` 

```python
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sdevice\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\sobject\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\ssystem\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\srequirement\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\sphenomena\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(Tactical|Master|Correlator|Control)\s+(System|Computer|Device|Layer)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1] + ' ' + match[2] + ' ' + match[3])
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(Master|Correlator|Control)\s+(Computer|Device|Layer)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[1] + ' ' + match[2])
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(patient|sun|old)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[1])
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard|disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[1])
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(safety|performance|design|nuclear)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[0])
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(error|debug|messages|safety|nuclear)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[0])
    
    return entities
```

```python
def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    return result
```

```python
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(Correlator|Tactical|Monitor|Control)\s+(System|System\s+Monitor|System\s+Control)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[2] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(Monitor|Control)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(operator|sun|old|patient)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard\s+disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(safely|take-off|land|navigate|under|Instrument|Flight|Rules)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(shared|events|states|values|between|connected|entities)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Define the regular expressions for each entity type
    software_system_regex = r'\b(software|system)\b'
    physical_device_regex = r'\b(device|sensor|card|disk|tap|stripe|monitor|control|correlator|power|network|failure|breach|alarm|vehicle|regime)\b'
    environment_object_regex = r'\b(patient|sun|old|air|vehicle)\b'
    external_system_regex = r'\b(database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard|disk|system)\b'
    system_requirements_regex = r'\b(requirement|aim|purpose|continue|deviates|regime)\b'
    shared_phenomena_regex = r'\b(open|closed|failure|success|activated|deactivated|failure|success|deviates|regime)\b'

    # Find all matches for each entity type
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_regex, sentence)
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_regex, sentence)
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_regex, sentence)
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_regex, sentence)
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_regex, sentence)
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_regex, sentence)

    # Add the matches to the schema
    schema['Software System'] = software_system_matches
    schema['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches
    schema['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches
    schema['External System'] = external_system_matches
    schema['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches
    schema['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    # Return the schema as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(schema)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(APA|Tactical|System)\s+system\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] + ' system' for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(other|civilian|aircraft|altitude|aircraft|device|system)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(users|operators|aircraft|altitude|aircraft|civilian|air|space|altitude|aircraft|system)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|card|tap|disk|system)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(required|safe|separation|altitude|airspace|rules|FAA|system)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(separation|altitude|airspace|rules|FAA|system)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
    }
```

```python
        matches = re.findall(pattern, input_string, re.IGNORECASE)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
```

```python
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+( [a-z]+)*\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+( [a-z]+)*\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+( [a-z]+)*\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches
    
    return entities
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(0))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([a-z]+ sensors|security alarms)'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(0))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([a-z]+)'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(0))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(0))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([a-z]+ and [a-z]+ messages)'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(0))

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Device\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Object\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\bshall be\b|shall not be\b|shall\b|shall not\b|prior to\b|in order to\b|in order not to\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ data\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(Tactical|Master|Correlator|Power|Control|Computer)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(hardware|monitor|control|diagnostics|test|bench|interface|computer)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(patient|sun|old)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard|disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(requirements|aim|purpose|system|develop)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(event|state|value|connected|entities)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

# Test the function

print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

```python
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\bto [a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema definition
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    return result
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ device\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ the\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ database\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ requirement\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ event\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
```

```python
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|the)\s+(Correlator|Tactical|Core|support|security|access|control)\s+(System|Monitor|Control|Services)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1])
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(The|the)\s+(Tactical|Correlator|VLA|Expansion|Project)\s+(System|Environment|Device|Hardware)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[1])
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(The|the)\s+(patient|sun|old|Services)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[1])
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(The|the)\s+(database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard|disk|Project|Services)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[1])
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(The|the)\s+(varying|needs|Services)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[1])
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(The|the)\s+(level|abstraction|modularize|correlator|system|environment|needs|Services)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[1])
    
    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b(Software|System)\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b(Computer|Device|Machine)\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b(Patient|Sun|Old)\b',
        'External System': r'\b(Database|Magnetic|Stripe|Card|Tap|Disk)\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b(Maintenance|Monitoring|Login|Access|Security|Restriction)\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b(Event|State|Value|Information|Access|Security|Restriction)\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result
``` 

```python
        'Shared Phenomena': []

    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ device\b'

    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ object\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ requirements\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches
    
    # Shared Phenomena

    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches
    
    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(Tactical|Correlator|Backend|Data)\s+(Processing|System|Monitor|Control)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[2] + ' ' + match[3] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s+(secondary|virtual|network|device|card|disk)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(patient|sun|old)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(Backend|Database|Magnetic|Stripe|Card|Tap|Disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(to|support|avoid|meet|respond|have|sufficient|throughput|processing|requirements|deadlines|future|requirements)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[0] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(all|specific|data|processing|deadlines|future|requirements|correlator|hardware|inputs|data|loss|corruption|overflows)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[0] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities
```

```python
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s+system\b'
    if re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Software System'].append('The system')
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[a-zA-Z]+[-\s]?[a-zA-Z]+[-\s]?[a-zA-Z]+\b'
    physical_devices = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'].extend(physical_devices)
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[a-zA-Z]+[-\s]?[a-zA-Z]+[-\s]?[a-zA-Z]+\b'
    environment_objects = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'].extend(environment_objects)
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[a-zA-Z]+[-\s]?[a-zA-Z]+[-\s]?[a-zA-Z]+\b'
    external_systems = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'].extend(external_systems)
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[a-zA-Z]+[-\s]?[a-zA-Z]+[-\s]?[a-zA-Z]+\b'
    system_requirements = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'].extend(system_requirements)
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[a-zA-Z]+[-\s]?[a-zA-Z]+[-\s]?[a-zA-Z]+\b'
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'].extend(shared_phenomena)
    
    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(Tactical Control System|Correlator|Monitor and Control System|UPS|computers|peripherals|hardware|system|software)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(power|outage|failure|network|device|computer|peripheral|hardware|system|monitor|control|correlator|UPS)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(patient|sun|old|air vehicle|power outage|prolonged power outage|mission data|loss of critical mission data|loss of air vehicle control)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|network|system|Monitor and Control System)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(restore|power|sufficient|time|avoid|loss|critical|mission|data|air vehicle|control|power outage|prolonged power outage)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(restore|power|sufficient|time|avoid|loss|critical|mission|data|air vehicle|control|power outage|prolonged power outage|network|system|Monitor and Control System)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches
    
    return entities
```

```python
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ the [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
```

```python
def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ device\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result
```

```python
import re

    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) system'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) device'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) the'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) system'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) shall\s([A-Za-z\s]+)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[1] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) shared'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ software)'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(0))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(0))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+)'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(0))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(0))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [a-z]+ data)'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(0))

    return entities
```

```python
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}
```

```python
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Split the sentence into words
    words = sentence.split()
    
    # Define the keywords for each entity type
    keywords = {
        'Software System': ['system', 'software'],
        'Physical Device': ['computer', 'hardware', 'device'],
        'Environment Object': ['patient', 'sun', 'old'],
        'External System': ['database', 'card', 'disk'],
        'System Requirements': ['requirement', 'aim', 'purpose'],
        'Shared Phenomena': ['event', 'state', 'value']
    }
    
    # Iterate over each word in the sentence
    for word in words:
        # Iterate over each entity type
        for entity_type, keywords_list in keywords.items():
            # Check if the word is in the list of keywords for the current entity type
            if word.lower() in keywords_list:
                # If it is, add the word to the list of entities for the current entity type
                entities[entity_type].append(word)
    
    # Return the entities as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
```

```python
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities
```

```python
    # External System

    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(ASPERA-3 package|future Tactical UAVs)\b'

    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches
```

```python
import re
```
```python
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )+(?:software|system)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match.strip() for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )+(?:device|machine|equipment|system)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match.strip() for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )+(?:object|entity|thing|item)\b'
```

```python
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements

    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities
```

```python
def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ and [a-z]+ [a-z]+ alarms\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[a-z]+ percentile [a-z]+ [a-z]+ operator\b',
        'External System': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+ subsystem\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[a-z]+ designed\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+ operator\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The Tactical Control System shall have ergonomically designed operator controls and displays for the 5th percentile female to 95th percentile male operator."))
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\sSystem\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b\w+(?:\s\w+)?\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b\w+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\sSystem\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(Monitor|Control|System)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(Monitor|Control)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(operator|task|mission|execution|subsystem|system|failure|event|state|value|phenomena|messages|status|error|system|control|power|correlator)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(database|card|tap|disk|system|network|failure)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(given|appropriate|warning|messages|task|mission|execution|subsystem|system|control|power|correlator)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[0] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(status|error|messages|task|mission|execution|subsystem|system|control|power|correlator|phenomena|event|state|value)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[0] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(Tactical|Control|System)\b'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(0))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(display|flags|warning|flags|AV|Payload|ADT|GDT|faults)\b'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(0))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(operator|personnel)\b'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(0))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(system|acknowledgment|notice|repair)\b'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(0))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(acknowledgment|repair)\b'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(any|critical|warning|flags|AV|Payload|ADT|GDT|faults|reboot|requests|self-heal|attempts|alert|notice)\b'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(0))

    return entities
```

```python
def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema definition
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+( and [a-z]+)*\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[a-z]+( and [a-z]+)*\b',
        'External System': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+( and [a-z]+)*\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [a-z]+( to be [a-z]+)*\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z]+( and [a-z]+)*\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over each entity type in the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result
```

```python
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sdevice\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\sobject\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\ssystem\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\srequirement\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\sphenomena\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+( [a-z]+)*\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+( [a-z]+)*\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+( [a-z]+)*\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+( [a-z]+)*\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

# Test the function
```

        'Shared Phenomena': []

```python
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device

    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities
```

```python
        'External System': r'\bthe\s\w+\sdatabase\b|\bthe\s\w+\smagnetic\sstripe\scard\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(Tactical|Correlator|DII Style|Graphical User Interface|User Interface)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(pointing|input|VCI|Correlator Monitor and Control System|Correlator Monitor and Control System test software)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(patient|sun|old)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|DII Style Manager)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(to allow activation of controls|so that pointing device characteristics can be modified|convenient and configurable tool|access the Correlator Monitor and Control System remotely)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(shared events|states and values|connected entities)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches
    
    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sdevice\b|\b\w+\sinterface\b|\b\w+\scontroller\b|\b\w+\scomputer\b|\b\w+\sjoystick\b|\b\w+\sstatus\b|\b\w+\sswitch\b|\b\w+\shardware\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\soperating\s\w+\b|\b\w+\sdatabase\b|\b\w+\smagnetic\s\w+\b|\b\w+\stap\b|\b\w+\shard\s\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\srecovery\b|\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bthe\s\w+\sSystem\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b\w+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches
    
    return entities
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sdevice\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    return result
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(Tactical|Monitor|Control|Center|DMS|System)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s+(UAV|Monitor|Control)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(user|patient|sun|old|Center|DMS|operator)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s+(database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard|disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s+(specific|constant|contrast|background|icon|shape|visual|information|coding|mechanisms)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[1] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(status|error|messages|Target|DMS|Message|displayed|Beacons|On|Off|UAVs|primary|control)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(Tactical|Control|System|HCI|CCTNS|LCS|SSS479)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(PDA|mobile|data|terminals|tap|hard|disk)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(map|patient|sun|old|LCS|SAR|imaging|swath)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|card|magnetic|stripe|hard|disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(provide|access|select|move|reorient|display|the|following)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(displaying|the|following)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z\s]+ Software System\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z\s]+ device\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z\s]+ object\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z\s]+ system\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z\s]+ shall\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z\s]+ phenomenon\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\b\s+shall\s+\w+\s+be\s+able\s+to\s+\w+\s+the\s+\w+\s+System\s+HCI\b'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group().split('shall')[1].split('be')[0].strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b\w+\s+shall\s+be\s+able\s+to\s+support\s+\w+\s+identifier\b'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group().split('support')[0].strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b\w+\s+shall\s+be\s+able\s+to\s+support\s+\w+\s+information\b'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group().split('support')[0].strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\s+shall\s+be\s+able\s+to\s+support\s+\w+\s+identifier\b'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group().split('support')[0].strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+\s+shall\s+\w+\s+be\s+able\s+to\s+support\s+\w+\s+video\s+snapshots\b'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group().split('shall')[1].split('be')[0].strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+\s+shall\s+be\s+able\s+to\s+support\s+\w+\s+identifier\b'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group().split('support')[0].strip())

    return entities

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b|PDA|mobile data terminals|thermostats|humidistats|contact sensors|security sound|light alarms|power switches|land based platforms',
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b|to provide access to the interfaces|to be integrated and operated',
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

# Test the function
```
